name: Wall, or Floor?
description:
This game is a mix of a 2D platformer and a top down shooter. You can change gravity from going down, to pushing back away from the screen! I made it in under one week. Hope you enjoy! 


YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCuqVBv1nzgC1hfxupeaZEQ?view_as=subscriber

Twitter: https://twitter.com/GearAntique
